question: What is the proportion of EPT specimens in the community (%)
help_entry: EPT refers to the insect orders Ephemeroptera, Plecoptera and Trichoptera

question: What is the proportion of grazers (%)
help_entry: Grazers feed on algae and biofilm

question: What is the saprobic status
help_entry: The saprobic status is derived from the German Saprobic Index (values in brackets)

question: What is the Average Score per Taxon
help_entry: This index (ASPT) is part of the British RIVPACS assessment system

question: What is the proportion of shredders (%)
help_entry: Shredders feed on coarse particulate organic matter (CPOM)
